title: Are we ever going to consider replacing the Memorial Bridge? I know that a very long time ago the City voted for a memorial bridge but times have changed, progress has occured. Instead of throwing funding away on paint, repairs and maintenance why can\'t we get a high rise like the Bruns Co beaches have? Seems to me it would easily solve the traffic issues. If everyone loves it so much, fine keep it as a memorial but put a functional high rise beside it.
text:
The Wilmington Bypass is expected to be complete by 2016:
